insert into tb_shipping (id, user_id, is_default, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_mobile, receiver_province, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
